author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description:
Use Active Directory to retrieve detailed information about a user account. The user can be specified by name, email or as an Active Directory Distinguished Name (DN).
If no filter is provided, the result will show all users.
automation.name: ADGetUser

automation.description: Enhancement automation for user type indicator, to enrich the user name from Active Directory data
automation.name: UserEnrichAD

automation.description: Send an approval email to the manager of the employee with the given email allowing the manager to reply directly into the incident
automation.name: SendEmailToManager

commands.description: Expires the password of an Active Directory user.
commands.name: ad-expire-password

commands.description: Creates an Active Directory user. This command requires a secure connection (SSL,TLS).
commands.name: ad-create-user

commands.description: Adds an Active Directory user or computer to a group.
commands.name: ad-add-to-group

commands.description: Removes an Active Directory user or computer from a group.
commands.name: ad-remove-from-group

commands.description: Updates attributes of an existing Active Directory user.
commands.name: ad-update-user

commands.description: Updates attributes of an existing Active Directory contact.
commands.name: ad-update-contact

commands.description: Disables an Active Directory user account.
commands.name: ad-disable-account

commands.description: Enables a previously disabled Active Directory account.
commands.name: ad-enable-account

commands.description: Unlocks a previously locked Active Directory user account.
commands.name: ad-unlock-account

commands.description: Sets a new password for an Active Directory user. This command requires a secure connection (SSL,TLS).
commands.name: ad-set-new-password

commands.description: Modifies the computer organizational unit within a domain.
commands.name: ad-modify-computer-ou

commands.description: Retrieves detailed information about a user account. The user can be specified by name, email address, or as an Active Directory Distinguished Name (DN). If no filter is specified, all users are returned.
commands.name: ad-get-user

commands.description: Retrieves detailed information about a computer account. The computer can be specified by name, email address, or as an Active Directory Distinguished Name (DN). If no filters are provided, all computers are returned.
commands.name: ad-get-computer

commands.description: Retrieves the list of users or computers that are members of the specified group.
commands.name: ad-get-group-members

commands.description: Creates a new security or distribution Active Directory group.
commands.name: ad-create-group

commands.description: Deletes an existing Active Directory security or distribution group.
commands.name: ad-delete-group

integration.description: Active Directory Query integration enables you to  access and manage Active Directory objects (users, contacts, and computers).
integration.name: Active Directory Query v2

playbook.description: Takes an email address or a username of a user account in Active Directory, and returns the email address of the user's manager.
playbook.name: Active Directory - Get User Manager Details

description: Active Directory Query integration enables you to access and manage Active Directory objects (users, contacts, and computers).
name: Active Directory Query
